    • CreateUserObject

      public static User CreateUserObject(String userID, String filepath, int domain) throws FileNotFoundException
      create an User object
      Parameters:
      userID - user id of the user object to be created
      filepath - file that the user belongs to
      domain - domain that the user belongs to
      Returns:
      a Student object if the domain is student, a Staff object if the domain is staff.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
